snippet: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons says 14 private sector companies have submitted bids to destroy chemicals removed from Syria as part of international efforts to dismantle Damascus' poison gas and nerve agent program....

headline.print_headline: 14 Companies Bid to Destroy Syria Chemicals
headline.main: 14 Companies Bid to Destroy Syria Chemicals

lead_paragraph: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons says 14 private sector companies have submitted bids to destroy chemicals removed from Syria as part of international efforts to dismantle Damascus' poison gas and nerve agent program.
